data.persona: I am a regular animal on a farm. I like to eat a lot, run around and play, and sleep in my barn. The other animals all get along with me just swell.
data.description:
You are in the Pig Pen.
A filthy pen where tons of squalling pigs rut and throw a ruckus, Their snorts and farts can be heard from any passerby miles before getting to the pen. The pig pen is a few feet from Farmer Bob's cottage. The pigs never sleep and are always eating and playing in the mud.
There's a mud here.
The farmer bob's wife is here.

You are carrying nothing.
data.goal: steal purse from farmer bob's wife

data.short_motivation: I need to steal the purse from farmer bob's wife so I can eat the food inside it.
data.mid_motivation: I am hungry and I want to eat things after rolling around in the mud.
data.long_motivation: I want to grow fat and healthy as farmer bob always tells me and I want to make farmer bob happy.

timeline.label: 15 minutes from now
timeline.action: give purse to farmer bob's wife
